vocabInfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Aph(?) of the tribe of Judah, first mentioned at 1Ch.2.30; descended from Nadab (H5070I); along with Seled (H5540);
progenitors of: Ishi (H3469)
§ Appaim = "nostrils"
a son of Nadab
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Jerahmeel; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞遍 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "鼻孔"
拿答的一個兒子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚遍 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "鼻孔"
拿答的一个儿子
